thread.title: The Obamas Will Always Be the President and First Lady of Shade
thread.title_full: The Obamas Will Always Be the President and First Lady of Shade

author: gizmodo
title: The Obamas Will Always Be the President and First Lady of Shade
text:
Image by Tara Jacoby, featuring the shade artist at a young age. Today is a very bad and extremely sad day.
Advertisement 

I’m going to try for a bit of levity now. 
By the way, that was not shade and don’t let anyone tell you otherwise. 

In this week’s Shade Court, Rick Perry is a dumb dumb, I am personally trolled and the Obamas bring it home. 
Shade Court Docket #2017JZ 5 
Images via Getty and the New York Times The Case: Rick Perry is an idiot who thinks glasses have some sort of special metal in them that literally makes you smarter when you put them on. Rick Perry is also probably going to be the next Secretary of the Energy Department. As you can imagine, people are talking about him—specifically, here’s the New York Times. 
Advertisement 

For Mr. Moniz, the future of nuclear science has been a lifelong obsession; he spent his early years working at the Stanford Linear Accelerator Center. Mr. Perry studied animal husbandry and led cheers at Texas A&M University.
The Defendant: 80% of the people who read the article
